name: Rumble
title: the Mechanized Menace
lore: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff and sneer at his junkyard creations, Rumble doesn't mindâ€”after all, he's the one with the flamespitter.
blurb: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff...
allytips: Try and pace yourself to stay in the Danger Zone to maximize your effectiveness. It is easy to overheat if you rapidly use your abilities.
Try and keep targets in the range of your Flamespitter. It can deal a lot of damage overtime.
If you are winning a fight you can use your ultimate to wall off an escape path.
enemytips: Watch Rumble's Heat bar carefully. If you see him Overheat, go in for the kill while his skills are disabled.
Rumble's ultimate can deal a lot of damage if you stay inside the area of effect. When you see the missiles falling, move out of the way as quickly as possible.
Rumble deals almost entirely magic damage. Build some Magic Resistance to reduce his damage.

riot_spell_q.name: Flamespitter
riot_spell_q.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Rumble torches his opponents, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone over {{ e9 }} seconds. This spell deals {{ e4 }}% damage to minions.

Danger Zone Bonus: Deals {{ e5 }}% damage.

riot_spell_w.name: Scrap Shield
riot_spell_w.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Rumble tosses up a shield for {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Rumble also gains an additional {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e6 }} second.

Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.

riot_spell_e.name: Electro Harpoon
riot_spell_e.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

riot_spell_r.name: The Equalizer
riot_spell_r.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for {{ trailduration }} seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ slowamount }}% and take {{ damagepersecond }} magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

riot_spell_i.name: Junkyard Titan
riot_spell_i.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Junkyard Titan
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|{{tip|Heat}}:}} '''Rumble''' gains ''{{tip|Heat}}'' each time he uses a basic [[Champion ability|ability]] (20 for {{ai|Flamespitter|Rumble}}, 20 for {{ai|Scrap Shield|Rumble}}, 10 for {{ai|Electro Harpoon|Rumble}}) and loses 10 ''{{tip|Heat}}'' per second after not using any abilities for 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Danger Zone:}} '''Rumble's''' basic abilities are enhanced when he is at/above 50 ''{{tip|Heat}}''.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: {{sbc|Overheating:}} At 100 ''{{tip|Heat}}'', '''Rumble''' becomes '''Overheated''', {{tip|silence|silences}} himself for 6 seconds. While {{tip|silence|silenced}}, his [[basic attack]]s deal {{pp|25 to 110|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} each while his ''{{tip|Heat}}'' decays back to 0 over the duration.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The enhanced attacks apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but do not affect structures.
* ''Rumble'' can use [[summoner spell]]s and/or [[active ability items]] while {{tip|silence|silenced}}.
** Even though he can use the summoner spell, he is unable to {{si|Cleanse|cleanse}} the silence, neither can he reduce the silence's duration in any way.

wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' activates his flamethrower for 3 seconds, granting 20 {{tip|Heat}} and dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of him. Deals reduced damage to {{tip|minions}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|{{#var:b1}} to {{#var:b5}}}} {{as|(+ {{fd|{{#var:r}}}}% AP)}}|Damage Per {{fd|0.25}} Seconds|{{ap|{{#var:b1}}/12 to {{#var:b5}}/12|round=3}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:r}}/12|round=2}}% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.name: {{ap
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Flamespitter'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Rumble's''' previous orders.
* '''Rumble''' will instantly turn to face the cursor if he is not moving when ''Flamespitter'' is cast.
* ''Flamespitter'' is not canceled by self-stasis effects (e.g. {{ii|Stopwatch}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}}).

wikia_skill_w1.name: Scrap Shield
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: While shielding himself '''Rumble''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} until the duration of the shield ends or the shield is broken.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Junkyard Titan 2|Rumble|Danger Zone}}:}} ''Scrap Shield's'' effects are increased by 50%.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling3:
{{st|Enhanced Shield Strength|{{ap|100*1.5 to 220*1.5}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Enhanced Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20*1.5 to 40*1.5}}%}}
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * ''Scrap Shield'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Rumble's'' previous orders ([[basic attack]] animation is canceled on-cast).

wikia_skill_e1.name: Electro Harpoon
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rumble''' stores an ''Electro Harpoon'' charge periodically (up to 2 at once).
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' shoots a harpoon, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. Hitting the same target with another harpoon enhances the {{tip|slow}} (stacks additively).
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|60 to 160}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|60*2 to 120*2}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Slow|{{ap|15 to 35}}%|Total Slow|{{ap|15*2 to 35*2}}%}}
wikia_skill_e1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Junkyard Titan 2|Rumble|Danger Zone}}:}} ''Electro Harpoon's'' effects are increased by 50%.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling3:
{{st|Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|60*1.5 to 160*1.5}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Enhanced Magic Damage|{{ap|60*1.5*2 to 160*1.5*2}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Enhanced Slow|{{ap|15*1.5 to 35*1.5}}%|Total Enhanced Slow|{{ap|15*1.5*2 to 35*1.5*2}}%}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* Two consecutive ''Electro Harpoon'' hits on the same target cannot reduce enemy movement speed below 110, reducing non-linearly when going below 220 (gets closer to 110 the stronger the {{tip|slow}}, varying between 110 and 120 if the target didn't purchase {{ii|Boots of Swiftness}}).
* Each ''Electro Harpoon'' cast triggers {{ii|Sheen}} (and its upgrade)'s {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacks {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: The Equalizer
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Rumble''' deploys a barrage of rockets 1000 units down the target path, landing in a line over 1 second and lasting for 5 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Enemies within the line of rockets take {{as|magic damage}} every half-second and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 35%. After leaving the area the damage will linger for 1 second.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage Per Half-Second|{{ap|70 to 140}} {{as|(+ {{fd|17.5}}% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|70*10 to 140*10}} {{as|(+ 175% AP)}}}}
